title: Baldurs Gate 3 Wiki

s will be guided through an informative step-by-step process that allows new players to Dungeons & Dragons and other Larian Studios titles to have a full understanding of the choices they are making and to fully immerse themselves into the role of their character. Character Creation is a vital first step in playing the game as the choices you make will affect how the world reacts to you, and vice versa, how you interact with the world.
